title: How to Keep Your House Cool in Summer Without Electricity
itunes:title: How to Keep Your House Cool in Summer Without Electricity
description: How to keep your house cool in summer without electricity, especially during the hot months when you need to have your canner and stove going. I share 8 old-fashioned pioneer tips that still work and don't require electricity as well as a few modern ways that are worth it to help keep the homestead cool. Explore outdoor cooking & canning options, get links, resources and full articles at https://melissaknorris.com/148
